## Archivable class

Something to Archive.

From an URL, which part to pick from that page, what to truncate.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class Archivable implements IArchivable
```

<b>Implements:</b> [IArchivable](./archivable.iarchivable.md)
